item.title: Report E-2024120427
item.description:
Report E-2024120427

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-02
  • City: MONUMENT
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: GROENDYKE TRANSPORT INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Driver was unloading when Premium with Ethanol began leaking out of the vapor line. Approximately twenty gallons was spilt onto the concrete parking lot. Driver cleaned the spill immediately with spill pads. Driver also mentioned that the veeder root was malfunctioning.
